name: S'peat fighter
description:
SP’EAT FIGHTER is a 2D combat couch game playable up to 4 players where you play as a jelly that can eat and create platforms as you wish.
The more you eat, the bigger you get, but be careful, if a player touches you, you will shrink and be easier to kill.
Kill your opponents and be the King of Jellies !
